sentences.sentence: Polish Prime Minister Donald Tusk arrived in Kyiv on Monday for talks with Ukrainian President Volodymyr Zelensky.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_17
sentences.sentence: The pair are set to discuss bilateral relations and the ongoing grain shipment and trucking dispute between their two countries.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_17
sentences.sentence: Tusk, who returned to power in Poland last month, vowed to continue to support Ukraine in its almost two-year war with Russia.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_13
sentences.sentence: The far right is rising across Europe and the next European Parliament could be the most right-wing ever. According to polls, if the nationalist parties joined in a single group, it could become the largest one in the chamber.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_13
sentences.sentence: The European Conservative and Reformists include Fratelli d'Italia, Spain's Vox and Poland's Right and Justice Party.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_13
sentences.sentence: While France's Rassemblement National, Germany's Alternative für Deutschland and Italy's Lega belong to identity and democracy, a merger seems unlikely. La lega nazionale, l'alternativa per la Germania e l'alternativa per l'Italia, sono identità e democrazia.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_06
sentences.sentence: La mergine sembra impossibile. Il presiedere viene da una tradizione politica, quella conservatrice, che ha radici, che ha caratteristiche diverse da quelle di D. i partiti populisti si uniranno in un gruppo o nell'altro. Il più relevante è il fidescio di Viktor Orbán.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_13
sentences.sentence: E alcuni stanno già cercando di sedurli.

sentences.sentence: in quest'ottica, cioè capendo che uniti siamo più forti nel portare avanti le nostre istanze.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_00
sentences.sentence: Sembra chiaro che nel prossimo termine le parti più a destra avranno più potere per influenzare le politiche in Brasile. Ma secondo gli esperti, questo potrebbe anche li portare a raffreddare le loro stesse.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_01
sentences.sentence: Sono eurosceptici perché sentono che non possono influenzare il processo di decisione They are Eurosceptic because they feel that they cannot influence the Brussels decision-making process.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_01
sentences.sentence: The moment they are part of the game, part of the decision-making process, they become – some of them, again, I'm not talking about all of them – but they become less Eurosceptic and they want to be also seen as pro-European.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_01
sentences.sentence: In fact, many of them see themselves as pro-European, even though in Brussels they're not seen as such.

sentences.sentence: The far right will certainly be in the next European Parliament.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_13
sentences.sentence: It remains to be seen, though, how far they can go to forge alliances and hold their cards at the same time.

The visit was apparently in response to calls from some Jewish religious leaders for the CEO of X to see with his own eyes the most symbolic site of the horrors of the Holocaust.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_17
sentences.sentence: Spain's famous El Prado Museum is working on becoming more inclusive.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_17
sentences.sentence: To do so, it is changing some of the language found in the short descriptions next to the paintings it has on display to more respectful terms.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_17
sentences.sentence: Gone are words such as dwarf or handicapped.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_17
sentences.sentence: However, if the terms are in the title attributed by the artist, those do not change, explained the museum's conservator.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_07
sentences.sentence: It was explained that she represented the infant Isabel Clarugenia with the dwarf Magdalena Ruiz.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_04
sentences.sentence: We are already seeing that she is a person who has a short stature, she is short, it is not necessary to explain that she is a dwarf. Bajita, es bajita, no hace falta explicar que es una enana. Pues más correcto políticamente hablando y pues que es un avance en términos de igualdad y pues que hay que valorar a todas las personas.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_17
sentences.sentence: Las cambios vienen siguiendo la decisión del Parlamento Español la semana pasada para amendar la Constitución.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_17
sentences.sentence: Los MP votaron para reemplazar el término de handicap a personas con discapacidad. decision last week to amend the constitution. MPs voted to replace the term handicap to persons with a disability. A terminology change long called for by Spain's disability community.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_02
sentences.sentence: boat but it's in fact a floating science Depuis avril 2023, les scientifiques sur board ont traqué la santé et les niveaux de pollution dans l'eau.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_02
sentences.sentence: Mais pendant quelques semaines, le bateau a été bloqué sur les bancs du rivage Rhône.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_02
sentences.sentence: Après la France, le bateau va traverser l'Espagne et l'Italie avant d'arriver à Athènes en juillet.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_02

sentences.sentence: Le but de la mission Terre-Europa Trek, c'est de mesurer l'impact anthropique des êtres humains sur le littoral, principalement parce que le littoral, c'est un lieu de biodiversité qui est énorme.

sentences.sentence: Ça n'a jamais été fait pour l'instant, c'est quelque chose qui est fait sur une échelle de l'Europe complète, donc c'est 22 pays européens.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_10
sentences.sentence: On traque à peu près 4000 produits chimiques, dont de pesticides, de pharmaceutiques, qui ont été listés.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_10
sentences.sentence: Et on regarde si on les retrouve déjà terre, mer, et quelles sont les interactions avec les micro-organismes.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_02
sentences.sentence: Le Rhône passe par la Suisse et la France.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_02
sentences.sentence: C'est l'un des plus grands rues de l'Europe, mais aussi l'un des plus pollués, comme l'a expliqué le chef de l'Association de la santé publique de la TARA.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_12
sentences.sentence: C'est un fleuve un peu particulier avec un pool de production industrielle, chimique, plasturgique très important.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_12
sentences.sentence: Un des buts de visée, c'est d'avoir une vision globale sur notre continent de ce qui se passe et de ce que sont les priorités.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_12
sentences.sentence: Alors ça peut être des priorités globales, et ça peut être également des priorités bassin par versant, bassin versant par bassin versant.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_02
sentences.sentence: En 2023, la réglementation implémentée de l'UE a l'objectif de restaurer au moins 20% des zones de terre et de l'eau à travers l'Europe en 2030.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_02
sentences.sentence: Mais est-ce que la pollution à un niveau local a un impact européen?

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_12
sentences.sentence: Les molécules chimiques circulent dans le monde.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_12
sentences.sentence: On va les retrouver dans l'eau du Rhône, on va les retrouver forcément par nature après, dans les mers, dans les océans, on va les retrouver également dans l'atmosphère.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_12
sentences.sentence: Donc il n'y a pas de frontière à la pollution.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_12
sentences.sentence: Il faut bien être conscient que tout ce qui affecte la nature quelque part l'affecte globalement.
